issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.twitch.tv](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv) ### Comment > 애드가드가 작동 중일 때, 팔로우 중인 스트리머의 방송은 무한로딩 됩니다. 하지만 제가 팔로우 중이지 않은 스트리머의 방송을 보면 방송이 정상적으로 나옵니다. When AdGuard is running, the broadcasts of streamers I'm following are loaded infinitely. However, when I watch a streamer's broadcast that I don't follow, the broadcast appears normally. comment.body:
It seems that this issue is caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`, so please disable this filter list or add this rule:
```adblock
baidu.com#@#.share-list
```
to user rules.

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
